display_title.display_title:
Yugoslavia - Second Railway
            Project : Loan 0395 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: (1) the
            installation of electric traction on the above main lines;
            (2) the installation of modern signalling and
            telecommunication systems over the lines and of automatic
            block systems on those sections with the heaviest traffic
            loads; (3) the construction of four new marshalling yards at
            Belgrade, Zagreb, Ljubljana and Skopje, and the extension
            and modernization of the existing yards at Nis and Doboj.
            The project is well-conceived and includes only items of the
            highest priority.
